resources.string:
Nightly version:
 · New: Set targetSDK to 28 to comply with upcoming Play Store requirements.
 · Please add project "targetSDK28" when reporting any issues at "https://github.com/cgeo/cgeo/issues".
 · Known issues for targetSDK28 can be found at "https://github.com/cgeo/cgeo/projects/10".
 
 · New: Updated Google Maps API to v2.
 · Please add project "Google Maps V2" when reporting any issues at "https://github.com/cgeo/cgeo/issues".
 · Known issues for Google Maps v2 can be found at "https://github.com/cgeo/cgeo/projects/8".
